protobuf.codec.json
Class JsonCodec

java.lang.Object
  protobuf.codec.AbstractCodec
      protobuf.codec.json.JsonCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class JsonCodec
extends AbstractCodec

Json-protobuf serializer/deserializer.Relies on jackson as the underlying parser. Supports UnknownFieldSet, extension field names prefixed with Feature#EXTENSION_FIELD_NAME_PREFIX and a "-"/ ex: "extension-name" idenfies an extension file by type name In case the Feature#UNKNOWN_FIELDS is enabled ( this feature is enabled by default) each json object in could contain a field by name "unknownfields" or whatever value the is set to. The value of this field is hex encoded byte string.

Author:
sijuv

Method Detail

readFromStream

protected com.google.protobuf.Message readFromStream(com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder builder,
                                                     Reader reader,
                                                     com.google.protobuf.ExtensionRegistry extnRegistry)
                                              throws IOException
Fills in a message from the data from the stream, The stream is not closed once the message is read in, the extn field names need to be boxed. UnknownFieldSet passed is passed in the field defined by . The UnknownFieldSet provided is parsed in only if the Feature#SUPPORT_UNKNOWN_FIELDS is enabled. The value passed in as unknown field should be corresponding hex encoded byte[] The Feature#EXTENSION_FIELD_NAME_PREFIX controlls how the extension field names need to be.

Specified by:
readFromStream in class AbstractCodec
Parameters:
builder - the message builder
reader - the input stream,
extnRegistry - the extension registry to use
Throws:
IOException
See Also:
Codec.toMessage(Class, Reader), AbstractCodec#mergeUnknownFieldsFromHexString(Builder, ExtensionRegistry, String)

writeToStream

protected void writeToStream(com.google.protobuf.Message message,
                             Writer writer)
                      throws IOException
Writes out the messages as a json object the provided stream. The stream is not closed once the message is written out. UnknownFieldSet is serialized out as a hex byte string.

Specified by:
writeToStream in class AbstractCodec
Parameters:
message - the provided protobuf message
os - the output stream onto which the message is written to.
Throws:
IOException
See Also:
Sample response:
{"id":1,"name":"elton john","extension-bar":1,"extension-id":24,"extension-place":"london"} bar and place are extension fields., AbstractCodec.encodeUnknownFieldsToHexString(UnknownFieldSet)
